channel.title: Just so you know mopar
channel.description: I personally am still waiting for the server. New starts are more awesome than playing on a server where some people already have bils.

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“Kaibutzu, post:35, topic:415390”]even with a bot and if u had all the ore it would take almost 1-2 weeks to smelt it and then u would have to smith it, on 1x

on rsc it took them like 6-9 months to do it and holy shit they had what 7 servers ?[/quote]That just show the idea of wasting ppl lives on his game by jaguex.

[quote=“http://www.pcgamer.com/2011/09/15/runescape-classic-opens-today-for-the-last-time/”]PC Gamer: Going back, what strikes you as the biggest differences Classic and Runescape as it is now?

Paul Gower: More players for a start! For example, it was never our intention for level 99 in a skill to be achievable yet here we are 10 years on and thousands of players have more XP than we’d ever imagined.[/quote]
A private server should be for having fun, enjoy the game-play of a game that was free to play for everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @Kaibutzu Kaibutzu
item.description:
@Kaibutzu wrote:

even with a bot and if u had all the ore it would take almost 1-2 weeks to smelt it and then u would have to smith it, on 1x

on rsc it took them like 6-9 months to do it and holy shit they had what 7 servers ?

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote author=cyndibal link=topic=517343.msg3763820#msg3763820 date=1317077793]deny it all you want, knowing that the only successful rsc server in history had 1x exp rates

On that basis we can create an even more successful one by reducing the XP rate to 0.5x, right?[/quote]Lets be honest, if it’s 1x, there’ll be more subs needed.
Think about it, money.

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

[quote author=cyndibal link=topic=517343.msg3763820#msg3763820 date=1317077793]deny it all you want, knowing that the only successful rsc server in history had 1x exp rates

On that basis we can create an even more successful one by reducing the XP rate to 0.5x, right?[/quote]
in theory, possibly, but “we” cant do shit as it seems. the reason why PK servers always die is cause theres no value to the accomplishments gained by PKing on them other than self-worth. People get bored when there’s nothing left to accomplish other than having the same exact fight at castle that just happened 5 minutes ago. On a server like jagex rsc, or even your server, the items themselves gives players an e-thug feeling that everyones lying if they say they don’t crave, otherwise they wouldn’t be playing an MMORPG…

its funny to hear you putting words in my mouth lollolol

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:31, topic:415390”][quote author=cyndibal link=topic=517343.msg3763393#msg3763393 date=1317052105]

[quote author=latifundio link=topic=517343.msg3763287#msg3763287 date=1317035997]

[quote author=cyndibal link=topic=517343.msg3763147#msg3763147 date=1317006438]

[quote author=latifundio link=topic=517343.msg3762901#msg3762901 date=1316997516]

actually it hurts skilling more than it hurts cb (nobodys going to get 99 smithing if its 1x exp, 3-4x is better i think)[/quote]This remember me of gaga in dark quest that got 98 smiting at 1x then server is shut down… lol

and either way, the game is more fun with lower exp, that way people are making use of what they have instead of using the incredibly stale shit we’ve been PKing with on rsca/rsce/stork for the past x years
[/quote]Fun with lower xp? Ah i know! making use of bots, yep that’s true!

rofl as if people dont bot on servers with high exp. yea, theres no botting going on at rsce :rolleyes:
[/quote]Yea rsce is not fun.

because of the high exp rates
[/quote][/quote]
deny it all you want, knowing that the only successful rsc server in history had 1x exp rates

Read full topic

@davidi2 wrote:

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:20, topic:415390”]Multiply the xp you need for levels by 4, xp multiplier: 4[/quote]^ That is 1x… what problem got solved?

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:19, topic:415390”]Multiplying everything by 4 is the same as 1x[/quote]When you wanted to do your own base on the 3hit dev forums, didn’t you say that when you chop a tree you would get 5x xp and 5 logs?
It is the same thing here, but by making leveling faster your affecting the servers economy, just look at RSCE economy. On rs2 ppl halve the money they need to spend on construction or smiting by playing the stealing creation mini-game, so the problem is that now they don’t need all those resources and that ppl that do the gathering of resources wont get the money they should or they could.

Remember that the topic is about the server economy… but mopar is already saying to set the xp at 1x, and that’s really bad (specially for training cb).

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Multiply the xp you need for levels by 4, xp multiplier: 4

problem solved

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:16, topic:415390”]That would be 1x…?[/quote]It still would be 4x but the price of resources for some skills like smithing, fletching, herblaw, crafting etc. should stay balanced. So if anyone wanna train those skill would need invest more than training at 1x.

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

[quote=“latifundio, post:15, topic:415390”]Something that could make the economy stable without lowering the xp rate so much could be instead using the same xp multiplier for base prices, resources and item respawn times and rarity on drops too.
For example in the case of X4 experience rate:

X4 base price of rune 2h (from 64k to 256k)
X4 time for avaliable ore on iron rocks (if it was 5 secs then 20 secs)
X4 respawn time on red spider eggs (if it was 30 secs then 2 mins)
X4 rarity of drop chance decreased for limpwurt roots from hobglobins.[/quote]

lol no

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

That would be 1x…?

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Something that could make the economy stable without lowering the xp rate so much could be instead using the same xp multiplier for base prices, resources and item respawn times and rarity on drops too.
For example in the case of X4 experience rate:

X4 base price of rune 2h (from 64k to 256k)
X4 time for avaliable ore on iron rocks (if it was 5 secs then 20 secs)
X4 respawn time on red spider eggs (if it was 30 secs then 2 mins)
X4 rarity of drop chance decreased for limpwurt roots from hobglobins.

Read full topic

item.title: Just so you know mopar
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:415390”]If everyone is so concerned with how easy it is to get to 99, maybe I’ll just start the server with a 1x experience rate and see how it goes? The rate can always be turned up, but turning it down wouldn’t be as fair.[/quote]Not everyone is concerned by that.
It’s only kryptix.

As for you kryptix.
Ask ur forum, what would they think of a reset once a year.
If that’d happen, even I’d play.

Read full topic
